info.title: Abstract Exchange Rates
info.description: Abstract's Exchange Rates is a fast, lightweight, modern service for looking up the latest exchange rates for 80+ currencies, getting historical exchange rates, and converting an arbitrary amount from one currency to another.

base.description: The base currency used to get the exchange rates.
base.title: Base

last_updated.description: The Unix timestamp of when the returned data was last updated.
last_updated.title: Last updated

exchange_rates.description: A JSON Object containing each of the target currency as the key and its exchange rate versus the base currency as that key’s value.
exchange_rates.title: Exchange rates

get.description: Returns the most recent exchange rate(s) for a given set of currencies.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base currency used to get the latest exchange rate(s) for. Uses the ISO 4217 currency standard (e.g., USD for United States Dollars).

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target currency or currencies (ISO 4217) to get the exchange rate of versus the base currency. If multiple currencies are passed in the target, they should be separated by commas (e.g., &target=EUR,CAD,AUD).

base.description: The base currency used to get the exchange rates.
base.title: Base

target.description: The target currency that the base_amount was converted into.
target.title: Target

base_amount.description: The amount of the base currency from the request.
base_amount.title: Base amount

converted_amount.description: The amount of the target currency that the base_amount has been converted into.
converted_amount.title: Converted amount

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate used to convert the base_amount from the base currency to the target currency.
exchange_rate.title: Exchange rate

last_updated.description: The date the currencies were pulled from, per the successful request.
last_updated.title: Last updated

get.description: Convert an arbitrary amount of currency to another.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base currency used to get the latest exchange rate(s) for. Uses the ISO 4217 currency standard (e.g., USD for United States Dollars).

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target currency (ISO 4217) to get the exchange rate of versus the base currency.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The historical date you’d like to get rates from, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD. If you leave this blank, it will use the latest available rate(s).

parameters.name: base_amount
parameters.description: The amount of the base currency you would like to convert to the target currency.
